name: Space pirate
description:
Space pirate - its a pre-alpha mega cosmosim

You are a pirate, and you can buy some stuff from black market on a planets, and you can kill every, but galactic police open hunting season on you

Controls - arrows, enter.

Enter - interaction with all

For sale items need to fly to the planet and press i

You can buy only those things that are highlighted in green

Step-by-step combat
